Body:
Instr = Instrument()
wedge = Wedge.Wedge(position=(0.5, 0, 0))
Det = Detector.TubeDetector1D(position=(1.0, 1, 0), direction=(1, 0, 0))
Ana = Analyser.FlatAnalyser(position=(0.5, 0, 0), direction=(1, 0, 1))
wedge.append([Det, Ana])
Instr.append(wedge)
plt.ioff()
fig = plt.figure()
ax = fig.gca(projection='3d')
Instr.plot(ax)
